check_query: SELECT exists (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE telegram_id = {});
insert_query: INSERT INTO users (id, telegram_id, strava_id, token_type, access_token, expires_at, refresh_token, notify) VALUES (DEFAULT, {}, {}, '{}', '{}', {}, '{}', 'f');
expires_at_query: SELECT expires_at FROM users WHERE telegram_id = {};
get_strava_id_query: SELECT strava_id FROM users WHERE telegram_id = {};
get_telegram_id_query: SELECT telegram_id FROM users WHERE strava_id = {};
update_query: UPDATE users SET token_type = '{}', access_token = '{}', expires_at = {}, refresh_token = '{}' WHERE telegram_id = {};
get_users: SELECT strava_id FROM users ORDER BY id ASC;
notify_status_query: SELECT notify FROM users WHERE telegram_id = {};
notify_switch_query: UPDATE users SET notify = {} WHERE telegram_id = {};
get_lang_query: SELECT lang FROM users WHERE telegram_id = {};
change_lang_query: UPDATE users SET lang = '{}' WHERE telegram_id = {};
